title: Theresa Villiers – 2014 Speech on Moving Northern Ireland Politics Forwards
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa Villiers, the Northern Ireland Secretary, at the Assembly Buildings in Belfast on 16th April 2014.
content:
